reviewText: I liked the dvd's. However, I was unable to find the 'workbook' anywhere. I called the manufacturer and was told that it is no longer provided as a 'hard copy' but was on the dvd's - it wasn't.

I am very disappointed with the audio discs of this program. The volume is very poor; even after turning my player to full volume one can barely hear what is being said on the discs. For this reason, I am giving this product a poor rating.
